mapper.select:
SELECT A.OD_ID , A.DEMAND_ID , LEFT(A.IN_DATE,10) AS IN_DATE , A.LG_PART_NO , COALESCE(A.LG_OD_QTY,0) AS LG_OD_QTY , A.TOOL_NAME , A.DRAW_NO , A.VENDOR , A.SUB_PART_NAME , A.PART_NUMBER , A.DESC , COALESCE(A.RESULT_QTY,0) AS RESULT_QTY , A.ROW_NUM , A.CALCU_TRUE , A.OD_QTY_ID , A.NEO_OD_TIME , LEFT(A.NEO_OD_DAY,10) AS NEO_OD_DAY , A.NEO_OD_QTY , A.FINAL_VENDOR FROM RFID_IF_PACKING_WOSENDLIST_ALL A WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER A.OD_ID ASC
ORDER BY A.OD_ID DESC
ORDER BY A.DEMAND_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_IF_PACKING_WOSENDLIST_ALL A WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO RFID_M_OUT_ORDER ( M_OUTER_ORDER_ID , COUT , ISDELIVERED , ISPRINTED , DATEORDERED , DATEPROMISED , DATEPRINTED , M_WAREHOUSE_ID , GROSSQTY , RSLTDATE , RSLTSTATE , READDATE , READSTATE , USE_YN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{odId} , #{receiptCnt} , 'Y' , 'N' , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , 1 , #{receiptCnt} , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , '0' , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ,'0' , 'Y' ,COALESCE(#{frstRegistPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{frstRegisterId},'SYSTEM') ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdtPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdusrId},'SYSTEM') )

SELECT get_seq('mOutOrderline')
INSERT IGNORE INTO RFID_M_OUT_ORDERLINE ( M_OUT_ORDERLINE_ID , DATEORDERED , DATEPRIOMISED , DATESHIPMENT , DESCRIPTION , M_PRODUCT_ID , M_WAREHOUSE_ID , C_UOM_ID , QTYOUTORDERED , M_OUT_ORDER_ID , C_SALES_ORDERLINE_ID , QTYSHIPMENT , ISDELIVERED , ISREPLACED , ISDISTRIBUTED , RSLTDATE , RSLTSTATE , READDATE , READSTATE , USE_YN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{mOutOrderLineId} , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , NULL , #{odId} , 1 , 1 , #{receiptCnt} , #{preQtyOnHand} , 'Y' , 'N' , 'N' , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , '0' , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ,'0' , 'Y' ,COALESCE(#{frstRegistPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{frstRegisterId},'SYSTEM') ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdtPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdusrId},'SYSTEM') )

INSERT IGNORE INTO RFID_C_INVOICEPO ( C_INVOICEPO_ID , COUNT , GROSSQTY , DATEINVOICED , DATEPRINTED , ISCLOSED , ISTRANSFERED , ISPAID , ISPRINTED , C_PURCHASE_ORDER_ID , M_IN_ID , DESCRIPTION , USE_YN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{odId} , #{receiptCnt} , #{preQtyOnHand} , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , 'N' , 'N' , 'N' , 'Y' , #{demandId} , NULL , NULL , 'Y' ,COALESCE(#{frstRegistPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{frstRegisterId},'SYSTEM') ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdtPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdusrId},'SYSTEM') )

SELECT get_seq('cInvoicePoLine')
INSERT IGNORE INTO RFID_C_INVOICEPOLINE ( C_INVOICEPOLINE_ID , C_INVOICEPO_ID , M_PRODUCT_ID , QTYINVOICED , C_UOM_ID , C_PURCHASE_ORDERLINE_ID , M_INLINE_ID , DESCRIPTION , USE_YN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{cInvoicePoLine} , #{odId} , #{lgPartNo} , #{preQtyOnHand} , 1 , #{odQtyId} , #{rowNum} , NULL , 'Y' ,COALESCE(#{frstRegistPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{frstRegisterId},'SYSTEM') ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdtPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdusrId},'SYSTEM') )
